spells.name: Avada Kedavra
spells.description: also known as the Killing Curse, kills a person instantaneously and without injury

spells.name: Confringo
spells.description: Blasting Charm; causes items the charm comes in contact with to burst into flames.

spells.name: Confundo
spells.description: Confundus Charm; causes the victim to become confused and disoriented.

spells.name: Crucio
spells.description: The Second Unforgivable Curse, the Cruciatus Curse; Tortures your opponent mercilessly.

spells.name: Expelliarmus
spells.description: Disarms the target of the spell, such as knocking their wand out of their hand.

spells.name: Ferula
spells.description: Binds a broken limb with a splint and bandages, tightly wrapped.

spells.name: Incarcerous
spells.description: Conjures up ropes, which then bind an opponent.

spells.name: Sectumsempra
spells.description: Causes lacerations to appear all over an opponentâ€™s body, as if they had been cut by an invisible sword.

spells.name: Stupefy
spells.description: Stupefies an opponent, or knocks them insensible temporarily.

spells.name: Obliviate
spells.description: Makes a person 'oblivious', erasing their memories of an event.
